In the next few steps, you'll tell Plex: 在之后的步骤中，您将需要告诉Plex您的音乐，视频，以及照片所存储的位置。Plex将会为您创建赏心悦目的资料库以管理这些媒体文件。
We will then show you how to get iOS, An: 后续将指导您如何获取iOS、Android、Mac、PC、互联网电视等平台的应用程序，以便您在任何设备上，无论是在家中或在路上，随时访问您的媒体库。
Please check that this file exists and t: 请确认此文件确实存在并且所需驱动器被正确挂载
最近没有被使用的频道
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: 对分类下全部入库媒体文件进行分析。分析提取的媒体信息将帮助 Plex 决定如何优化媒体回放。
Cleans up the library database and ensur: 清理资料数据库并确保其尽可能高速的运作。如果您有在资料库中添加或移除大量的媒体文件，效果将会相当显著。
Publishing a server makes it automatical: 发布服务器后，客户端设备无需配置路由器即可使用.
The media server stores information abou: The media server stores information about your media to disk, as well as posters, artwork, and other media resources from the Internet. Running this task deletes any bundles which are no longer in use.
Plex organizes your library into section: Plex将整理您的媒体库，分类组织。您可以根据需要增加分类，或将多个分类视为同一类型。
Removes a library section and all items: 清除媒体库本分类的全部内容，但不会删除媒体文件，且本操作也保留相关信息，以便未来再次添加时快速加载。
Name: 名称
Forces a download of fresh media informa: 从互联网强制下载最新的媒体信息，本操作将耗费较长时间。任何已锁定字段将不会被替换。
myPlex could not connect to your server: myPlex不能链接到你的服务器。
Please check that you have permission to: 请检查您有存取此媒体服务器的权限.
By default the media server doesn't remo: By default the media server doesn't remove information for media right away. This helps if a drive is temporarily disconnected. When you empty the trash for a section, all information about missing media is deleted.
Plex channels give you access to online: 通过Plex通道，你可以访问很多站点的在线媒体。从通道目录中，你可以浏览和安装这些通道，但是需要先安装一些通道。
There was a problem publishing your serv: 在发布您的服务器是遇到问题
Opened connection to {1}, listening for: 建立到{1}的连接，并响应事务。
Select which additional agents should co: 选择其他的代表并向{1}推荐为元数据，拖动可改变偏好的顺序。
如果自动映射失败请打开此选项，您将需要配置路由，详细帮助请点击这里查阅。
Help us out by following <a href='http:/: 请按操作指导 来帮助我们命名和组织您的媒体文件。

Add folders where your {1} are located: 在您的{1}所在位置增加文件夹
Tip: Select items by holding control/com: 提醒：按下Ctrl或Cmd按钮并点击鼠标左键可选择子项。
A problem has been detected with a core: Plex核心模块出现问题，请访问论坛提供您的日志，文字描述请参照说明。
Channels may require plugins to be insta: 部分频道可能需要在媒体服务器上安装插件，点击下面的链接运行插件安装器。
Add videos to your queue from the browse: 从浏览器添加视频到您的队列
Drag the link above to your bookmarks ba: 将上面的链接拖入浏览器书签栏。
To save a video to your queue, click “❯: 将视频保存到队列后，在书签栏中点击“❯ Plex It!”即可后续观看。
A panel will appear on the left side of: 页面左边将出现消息，以便您知晓视频已经被保存。
Or send videos to your queue by email: 或以邮件发送视频到您的队列
Every link that you email to this addres: 邮件发送到这个地址的任何链接将被添加到您的myPlex队列，请将这个地址增加到通讯录中，以便从iPhone、iPad、Android或任何设备上发送链接。
The media server responded with an error: 此媒体服务器报告了一个错误.
This page is only available for your med: This page is only available for your media servers.
Please sign in to myPlex to access your: 请登录 myPlex 来存取播放列表.
Search requires Plex Media Server 0.9.7.0 or later.
The Flash Player or a browser that suppo: The Flash Player or a browser that supports HLS is required to play videos.

\"Allow clients to delete media\" must b: "Allow clients to delete media" must be enabled in your server preferences.

保存你的修改时发生问题。

你确认删除{1}? 这个媒体将从你的文件系统中删除。
Are you sure you want to mark all episod: 确定标记所有剧集为未观看吗？
确定标记所有剧集为已看吗？
Let's start by giving your Plex server a: 请给 Plex 服务器命名，以区分网络上其他计算机。若留空不填写，默认使用现在的计算机名.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: 您愿意帮助我们改进 Plex 来更好满足用户需求吗? 我们会收集匿名数据来不断完善服务.
If you would like to receive announcemen: 如果愿意收到关于 Plex 的公告，请在下面输入您的电子邮箱. 别担心，我们不会发垃圾邮件.
myPlex makes it easy to get to your medi: 不管在任何地方， myPlex 会让您更容易存取自己的媒体。
With a myPlex account you will be able t:
With a myPlex account you will be able to queue up video from your browser,
access your content from outside your home and easily share content with friends and family.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: 看，并不太难，对吧？此刻，Plex 正不知疲倦地构建您的媒体库，并让它看起来更漂亮。快点享受 Plex 带来的美好生活吧，幸福的日子久久长啊！
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to download some Plex apps!
There was a problem accepting this frien: 这里有一个接受好友请求的问题

You need <a class='friends-btn' href='#!: 用 好友名 向朋友推荐媒体.

You need to <a href='{1}users/edit' targ: 必须使用 您账户的链接地址.
Attempt to play videos directly before f: 在使用转码器前尝试直接播放视频. 多数浏览器都支持直接播放 h264 编码图像和 AAC 编码音频的 mp4 影片. 直接播放的视频不包括字幕.
There was a problem saving your settings: 保存你的设定发生了问题。

While Plex Media Server will automatical: While Plex Media Server will automatically download updates for Plex/Web periodically, use "Check for Updates" to manually download updates.
There was a problem adding these items t: There was a problem adding these items to a collection.
Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Help us translate Plex/Web into your language here.
When multiple resolutions are available: 如果视频可用多个分辨率，自动使用尽可能高的。
同步该媒体时出现错误。
There was an error uploading this artwor: There was an error uploading this artwork. Try again.
Enter a url to upload an image from the: 输入一条url并上传一张图片至网络
Require authentication on local networks: 需要在本地网络上的身份验证
Populates the allowed networks setting w: Populates the allowed networks setting with 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate with myPlex before accessing the server.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding audio. Some devices, like the Wii U, only support HLS with AAC audio.
This name will be used to identify this: 这个名字将你的媒体服务器与你网络上其他的计算机区别开来。如果空白，将使用你的计算机名字。
Send anonymous usage data to Plex: 发送匿名的使用使用给Plex
This helps us improve your experience (f: 这将帮助我们改进你的使用体验（例如，帮我们匹配电影和电视表演）。
Plex Media Server verbose logging: Plex媒体服务器的详尽日志
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: 打开Plex媒体服务器的详尽日志
Ask to add a login item for externally m: 请增加登录项以便安装外部驱动器
Enable Plex Media Server debug logging: 打开Plex媒体服务器的调试日志
Your library will be updated automatical: 检测到资料库文件夹变动时自动更新资料库
Weeks to look at for On Deck: Weeks to look at for On Deck
The number of recent weeks used as the w: The number of recent weeks used as the window for On Deck
Update my library periodically: 周期性更新媒体库信息
Clients will be able to delete media: 客户端将可以删除库中媒体
Empty trash automatically after every sc: 每次扫描后自动清空垃圾桶
Include music sections in automatic upda: 在自动更新中包含音乐小节
Large music sections may take a long tim: 容量较大的音乐部分可能要花费更长的时间去扫描
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: 兼容性检查确保隐藏那些和服务器或正使用的客户端程序版本不兼容的插件。禁止兼容性检查能帮助开发，但某些客户端程序存取插件会出现不可信任的表现。
List of networks that are allowed withou: 不允许未经授权的网络列表
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: 无需身份验证的PMS被允许进入网络的IP地址/掩码为以逗号分隔的列表
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: 以秒为单位的超时分段转码器转码在等待并开始将数据写入
Transcoder default duration: 转码器默认的持续时间
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: 时间以分钟为单位转码时使用的东西与一个未知的时间
Directory to use when transcoding for te: 转码时使用的临时文件的目录
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: 进入转码器前缓冲长度，秒
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: 使用插件的显示WebKit的窗口，而不是把它关闭屏幕
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link 不支持播放特定区域的 DTS 音频. Plex 媒体服务器自动将 DTS 转为立体声播放.
Offer higher bitrates over 3G connection: 通过3G连接提供更高的比特率
Automatically select audio tracks in you: 可用时，自动根据首选语言选择音轨语言.
Client-specific configuration settings f: 客户端的DLNA服务器的具体配置设置
Protocol info string used in GetProtocol: 协议信息字符串，用于在GetProtocolInfo回应的DLNA服务器
DLNA media renderer discovery interval: DLNA媒体渲染器的时间间隔
Number of seconds between DLNA media ren: DLNA媒体渲染的搜索请求之间的秒数
DLNA server timeline reporting: DLNA服务器的时间安排报告
Enable the PMS DLNA server to report tim: 使PMS的DLNA服务器报告的视频播放活动的时间表
Service type for discovered servers: 发现服务器的服务类型为
This media will be synced to your device: 这个媒体文件将会同步到你的设备中。

Automatically play theme music in the ba: Automatically play theme music in the background when available.
